description: The historic trams may not run the full length of Douglas seafront until 2023, the government says.
title: Isle of Man horse tram track delay 'utter shambles', says MHK
title_page: Isle of Man horse tram track delay 'utter shambles', says MHK - BBC News
maintext: The "very complex" project could not be carried out at the same time as the carriageway works as the tracks relied on welding joints from the UK, which were "not easily available at the moment", he said.
